Name: Crazy Taxi
About the game: Hey hey, come on over and have some fun with Crrrrrazy Taxi! Barrel through traffic packed streets, hurdle off parking garages, and Crazy Combo your way to Crazy Money in a wild frantic race to scare up the most fares. In Crazy Taxi, time is money, and only the Craziest Cabbies come out victorious. Features Two Game Modes â€“ Arcade Mode and Original Mode for a variety of gameplay, and 16 Mini Games to hone your taxi driving skills. Extra large hills for extra long hang time Parked transporters with conveniently angled ramps Tall cliffs and parking garages with steep drops Painfully slow buses and cable cars to frustrate and annoy Occasional deep sea exploration opportunities!
